ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of MELANIE LYNN MACKAY of Richmond, British Columbia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of Ridley Terminals Inc., to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
